This method tries to save a player from bankruptcy when they cannot pay a debt to the bank.
saveFromBankruptcyTrade(Player, BufferedReader) - Static method in class operations.Transactions
To the save from bankruptcy in terms of trading, we can use this method to trade cards or properties which checks whether there is a player willing to make a trade with the bankrupt player.
